name: WooCommerce Change Guest Owner Order
author: cuxaro

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 5.6 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater (MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended)
  • Installation of WooCommerce

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of “WooCommerce Change Guest Owner Order”, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “WooCommerce Change Guest Owner Order” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our “WooCommerce Change Guest Owner Order” plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.
